Summary: White Sphere captured on camera while driving down the road
trends: There have been 30 other sightings in Westminster
There were no other sightings in Westminster on or around August 11th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was on the way home from work and was taking random photographs from my car. If the weather is good I always have the moon roof open and stick my arm out and take photos. While reviewing the photos later I found this white sphere. In a photo taken 4 seconds earlier of the same location the white sphere does not appear in the photograph. I was using my trusty Nikon Coolpix S630 camera.
